name: Moot Champions
description:
Moot Champions is a party game reality show in which our participants will have to go through a variety of minigames and fight each other in order to win the show.

DODGE

Every participant will have to dodge lasers in other to survive, who stand the longest, wins!

PAINT THE FLOOR

As the titles says, each participant will have to paint each tile, paint as much tiles as you can! (power-ups included).

PUSH AWAY

The platform is getting smaller, push your opponents away! But watch out with the jelly pillars...

Wanna help us with the game? Give us your feedback here: SURVEY
